projects.title: Auto Dimensioning Engine Rebuild
projects.summary: Refactored 4000+ lines of nest logic into abstract builder/director, allowing for greater extensibility and maintainability

projects.title: Select All Like UI Overhaul
projects.summary: Refactored UI in MVVM pattern with more modular and componentized controls

projects.title: PacMan Game
projects.summary: Create PacMan and Kriby sprites, and let them battle for supremacy! This project illustrates some dynamic interaction with the DOM as well as some physical space awareness.

projects.title: MBTA Transit Tracker
projects.summary: Track realtime location and capacity of MBTA buses. It's great if you're trying to get to MIT!

projects.title: Eyes Animation
projects.summary: Simple demo of working with css/js/html to animate the DOM and track mouse movement. Plus you get to make a green monster smile!
